name: [SA Game Jam 2016] Roll Out
description: You feel strange....which is weird because you've never felt before. All you can see is darkness and dust. Millions of questions enter your mind but one stands out and repeats itself: Who am I? A strange feeling of emptiness surrounds you. You start to move and end up knocking over the box you're stored in. As light fills your eyes you realize you are missing parts, missing your very identity. It becomes clear that your goal is to find out who you are and to escape this strange place. With great determination you roll out!
